item.title: Distributed Systems: Principles and Paradigms (2nd ed.)
item.description: Foundational coverage of distributed system models, communication, consistency, and coordination.

item.title: Introduction to Parallel Computing (2nd ed.)
item.description: A comprehensive textbook on models, algorithms, and performance analysis for parallel computing.
